author: bsunanda
body:
### PR description:

First test of the V19 geometry of HGCal (longitudinal structure part to be corrected still)

#### PR validation:

Tested with some some cfg files in Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/python

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx359O First test of the V19 geometry of HGCal (longitudinal structure part to be corrected still)
